name: Planet Not Found
description:
-----STORY-----        

Oh no! Your home planet was destroyed - and now you must search for a new one, but it seems like there aren't any...

Venture into the seemingly-endless asteroid belt to escape your broken home. Avoid obstacles, collect powerups, and upgrade your ship in hopes of finally finding a new home!

----- CONTROLS -----

Click your ship in the menu to change it

Just move your mouse to fire wherever your cursor is

If your game bugs out in any way, press the green flag to refresh the game's code

Press F on the title screen to provide feedback
